summary: Provides a collection of helper utilities to configure and run isolated, headless functional UI tests for the SecureDrop client application. It sets up temporary directories, database sessions, GPG contexts, and test environments, and offers convenience functions for logging in and managing test state using pytest-qt and vcrpy.
business_intent: Enable reliable, repeatable functional testing of the SecureDrop client UI by automating environment preparation, authentication handling, and resource cleanup, thereby supporting quality assurance and regression detection.
